title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         Former Secretary of the Interior, Ken Salazar, and NPS Director, Jon Jarvis, being interviewed inside of the house during the April 2013 dedication of the park. NPS / Tom Engberg  Current & Upcoming Events   Although the park is still in the process of being developed for visitor use, from time-to-time the park will host special events or will open "Youngsholm" to the public for interpretive tours.  You can view the searchable park Calendar to see what events are planned or visit our social media pages to stay up-to-date on current park happenings.   Please visit the guided tours page for information on dates when the house will be open for public tours.
